channel.title: Future You University
channel.description: "The most important education takes place on the campus of your mind." (Michael Spillman) - Come join us as we work to expand our thinking to focus on the POSITIVE as opposed to the NEGATIVE that surrounds us.
channel.itunes:author: Mike Spillman
channel.itunes:summary:
"Your greatest education takes place on the campus of your mind!"

Join Michael Spillman as he encourages us all to change our thinking to those positive thoughts that will propel us to a greater future and a better life!

Be sure to get your FREE material at www.FutureYouUniversity.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: A POWERFUL and POSITIVE way to start and IMPROVE your day!
